title: Security review remediation (F-01 through F-10)
description: Epic: Remediate all 10 findings from expert security review. SSRF bypasses (F-01, F-02, F-03), allowlist bypass (F-04), server hardening (F-05, F-06), XSS (F-07), supply chain (F-08), info leakage (F-09), missing headers (F-10).
close_reason: All 10 findings (F-01 through F-10) remediated with tests

title: WI-2: Structured JSON logging
notes: Plan: WI-2. Configure slog with JSONHandler to stdout. Request-scoped logger with SPEC fields.

title: Add Copy as Markdown button, URL copy button, and header dividers
close_reason: Added Copy as Markdown button, URL copy button, and vertical dividers to header bar

title: Add test fixtures to testdata/fixtures/
notes: Plan: WI-9/WI-18 gap. Create testdata/fixtures/ with: sample markdown files (GFM features, mermaid, frontmatter), MDX files from Docusaurus/Nextra patterns, code files (Python, Go), plaintext files. Used by golden file tests and integration tests.
close_reason: Created 15 test fixtures across 4 categories: 7 markdown (basic, gfm, mermaid, frontmatter, headings_toc, footnotes, code_blocks, complex), 2 MDX (docusaurus, nextra), 3 code (Python, Go, Rust), 2 plaintext (txt, log). Added smoke test that validates all fixtures render through the pipeline.

title: F-04: Fix allowlist prefix matching bypass
description: Replace HasPrefix with exact-or-subdomain match in CheckAllowedUpstream. cgit.internal must match but cgit.internal.attacker.com must not.
close_reason: Replaced HasPrefix with exact/subdomain match. Added regression tests for attacker.com bypass. Tests pass.

title: F-03: DNS TOCTOU protection via custom DialContext
description: Add custom DialContext to fetch client transport that resolves DNS and checks all IPs against ssrf.IsBlockedIP before dialing. Blocked by F-02.
close_reason: Added custom DialContext with SSRF IP blocking at dial time. Tests pass.
